content.html: I can finally think and breathe again. When you care so much about someone, you feel like the whole world is collapsing when they're not well. Good health is so important and so easy to take for granted!
content.value:
I can finally think and breathe again. When you care so much about someone, you feel like the whole world is collapsing when they're not well. 

Good health is so important and so easy to take for granted!
